","flaws":"Most people scream and run when they see a demon. I stop and take notes on its anatomy.
I speak without really thinking through my words, invariably insulting others.","ideals":"Knowledge. The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge. (Neutral)
Knowledge. The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge. (Neutral)","personalityTraits":"I’ve read every book in the world’s greatest libraries—or I like to boast that I have.
I … speak … slowly … when talking … to idiots, … which … almost … everyone … is … compared … to me."}}
